name: Ratchet & Clank: Full Frontal Assault PS Vita
name_original: Ratchet & Clank: Full Frontal Assault PS Vita
description:
Ratchet & Clank: Full Frontal Assault™ delivers a concentrated blast of pure fun to the PS Vita system!  The game blends the series' classic comedy, camera, and controls with an innovative new way to play.  Drop into the middle of an intergalactic conflict, choose your weapons, and experience Ratchet & Clank: Full Frontal Assault™ solo, or together with a friend online.

Purchase of the PS Vita version of this game entitles you to the downloadable PS3™ versions of this game and Ratchet: Deadlocked™ at no extra cost.
Requires the PS Vita and PS3™ system versions of the software (may be sold separately) for some features such as cross save. This item is being licensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America and is subject to the Network Terms of Service and User Agreement, this item’s use restrictions and other applicable terms located at www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not download this item.This item may be used with up to 2 activated PlayStation® devices associated with this Sony Entertainment Network Account.  Please see software description for device compatibility. Ratchet & Clank: Full Frontal Assault ©2012 Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC. Ratchet and Clank and Ratchet & Clank: Full Frontal Assault are trademarks of Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC. Developed by Insomniac Games.Ratchet: Deadlocked ©2005, 2013 Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC. Ratchet: Deadlocked is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC. Developed by Insomniac Games.
